TopicTitle: Using Utility Items From Inside Cockpit

Articles.Content: Is there a way to use the buttons inside the cockpit to activate any of the modules outside the ship? Like goo containers etc.
Not without modding. There's probably a plugin to RPM that has this potential, but stock your best bet is just putting them on action-groups. You can still use those from IVA.
Wellll, not exactly. But the cockpit is clickthrough, so if you know where something is on the outside you can activate it from the inside by clicking in the right spot.

I use a force IVA game, and use HullcamVDS to trigger science. Just point the cam at science parts and you can click on them.
